text: They Who Dare is a 1954 British World War II action movie directed by Lewis Milestone and starring Dirk Bogarde, Denholm Elliott, Akim Tamiroff, Harold Siddons, Eric Pohlmann, GÃ©rard Oury, Sam Kydd, Peter Burton, Eileen Way. ==Other websites== * * Category:1954 movies Category:1950s war movies Category:1950s action movies Category:British action movies Category:British war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone
